name: lastTickDuration
doc: how long, in milliseconds, you took on the last tick (will be 0 on initial turn)

name: lastMoveResult
doc: the result of your last turn (will be Succeeded on initial turn)

name: currentHitPoints
doc: how many hit points you have

name: surroundings
doc: array of tiles representing your immediate surroundings as a square with you in the middle

name: surroundingsRadius
doc: radius (from you) of the surroundings, so the side of a square is (this * 2) + 1
